file_content.text: You made quite an example out of Vomba. I think the other prisoners got the message.
It's done. Vomba's dead, and control has been returned to the terminal.
Then I can finally cross his name off the prisoner registration. Thank you, and good riddance.
And here--Vomba's bounty. Sods who caught him didn't survive the firefight, so they won't need it.
Vomba isn't going anywhere. Get to that terminal and finish him off.
My lord. Captain Heedley, Imperial Corrections. Sorry to impose, but I've got a mess on my hands.
You there, hunter. Got a job for you. Right up your alley.
Sir. Captain Heedley, Imperial Corrections. Got a fugitive on the lam, needs catching.
You mind helping me? Need a hand catching a fugitive on the run.
Was overseeing a prisoner transfer. Weequay pirate, name of Vomba. Couple bounty hunters caught him, wanted the reward.
Somehow Vomba's mates found out. Shut down our security droids, turned the entire spaceport into a war zone before they made off with him.
A dangerous criminal escaped on your watch? This doesn't bode well for you, Captain.
You have failed.
He hasn't gotten away yet, my lord. He's still holed up in the spaceport, making his final stand.
Even a child would have anticipated some ill-conceived rescue attempt.
You weren't prepared.
That's why I added the extra droid detail. Didn't expect he'd slice them.
How much are you willing to pay to get this Vomba back?
You mentioned a reward?
Vomba's gang polished off the bounty hunters, so I've still got a fat pile of credits waiting to be claimed.
There's no shortage of places to hide on Nar Shaddaa. He could be anywhere.
We'll never find him.
Vomba? He's still holed up in the spaceport. Making his final stand.
How will you get him back?
This Vomba--what's his story?
Tell me about the prisoner.
Career criminal, been in and out of a dozen prisons. Likes to hijack Imperial cruisers, take them on interstellar joyrides.
Between the droid shutdown and his cronies, that swaggering git has the run of the terminal. But we've got him cornered.
Negotiations ended with a dead diplomat, I'm not having any more of that. Rather someone just went in there and made an example of him.
Consider it done.
Much obliged.
Maybe he'll surrender.
He had his chance. Only way he's coming out of there now is in a box.
Vomba's gang has sliced control stations throughout the terminal. You reset them, the droids should power back on and do their part.
From there, it's just a matter of cleaning up. Go wild.
Won't be me. [Refuse quest]
We can't keep him boxed in forever.
That's the last time I trust a droid.
